CustomField.description: Enables the slack message sent to the Opportunity Owner when Reference Lead Finder is enabled, their Opportunity meets the Reference Lead Finder criteria, and the Account is already a Reference Program Member.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables the slack message sent to the Opportunity Owner when Reference Lead Finder is enabled, their Opportunity meets the Reference Lead Finder criteria, and the Account is already a Reference Program Member.
CustomField.label: RLF Initial - New Contact Slack
